General.Name: Hwail Pharmaceutical Co.Ltd
General.Description: Hwail Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. develops pharmaceutical raw materials in South Korea. It also provides finished formulation products; and food raw materials and functional health food ingredients. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Seongnam-si, South Korea.
General.Address: Korea BIO PARK C, Seongnam-si, South Korea
